text: did you know Ethiopia is the only
country in Africa that has never been
colonized by European power
today I will be experiencing the true
hidden culture of Ethiopia in a very
special place this place took a one-hour
flight from Addis Ababa plus an 8 hour
bumpy drive to find this place
voters South Sudan and Kenya and is far
separated from any touch of modern
society
this place has faces like this like this
and like this this place is called the
Omo Valley it's one of the most remote
and ancient inhabited regions left on
our planet the Omo Valley is so old that
the oldest recorded human fossils were
found here which date back 195,000 years
1/5 of a million years ago today the Omo
Valley is home to 10 distinct ethnic
groups and after spending all day with
various tribes
seeing their traditions and how they
survived which is cutting parts of the
goat here it makes me believe that not
much has changed for thousands of years
I'm here today with the Mersey tribe the
mercies are nomadic meaning they pick up
and move their huts whenever they find
better farmland or water sources they
don't wear clothes but rather body paint
made from clay and sometimes sheets over
their body as you can see behind me they
look amazing they have these really cool
facial decorations that I've never seen
before the women that pierced their
lower lips and insert these heavy clay
plates to attract a husband well that's

start when she's born and every year it

so from the beginning it's just a little
ears you know so they started to put a

is they also painfully tattoos

the screen right there look at that face

and you should have seen their faces
when I flew my drone the mercies are
